K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:409b-7: gzungs 'di bzlas brjod byed pa'i kha nas ji tsam tu tshig tu brjod par byung ba dge yang rung /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:409b-13: 'dre srin thams cad kyi thos par gyur na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:409b-14: de dag thams cad rnam par dag pa'i chos kyi dbyings nyid du 'gyur bas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:409b-15: de la sangs rgyas ji lta ba bzhin du gus pa'i sems bskyed nas bkur sti dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:409b-17: gzungs 'di 'don cing yongs su 'dzin pa de dag ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:409b-18: sangs rgyas kyi sku'i gter nyid du rig par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:409b-19: sangs rgyas gangg'a'i klung bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i bye ma snyed rnams kyis phangs shing gces par mdzad pa'i phyir ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:409b-21: 'od can gyi lus kyi gter yin par rig par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:410a-1: bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'od zer gyis snang bar mdzad pa'i phyir ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:410a-4: snying rje'i gter yin par rig par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:410a-5: 'di ltar gzungs kyis sems can yongs su skyob par byed pa'i phyir ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:410a-7: dam pa'i chos kyi sde snod yin par rig par bya ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:410a-8: gzungs kyi sgo thams cad kun sdud par byed pa'i phyir ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:410a-11: ting nge 'dzin gyi sde snod yin par rig par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:410a-12: ting nge 'dzin brgya stong rnams rtag par mngon sum du 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:410a-14: nam mkha'i mdzod yin par rig par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:410a-15: rtag par stong pa nyid kyi shes rab kyis sems can la lta ba'i phyir ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:410a-17: 'jigs pa med pa'i mdzod yin par rig par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:410a-20: dge ba'i lha rnams rtag par yongs su srung ba'i phyir ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:410a-22: dam pa'i tshig gi mdzod yin par rig par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:410a-23: kha nas gzungs kyi sgra 'byung ba la rgyun chad pa med pa'i phyir ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:410a-25: rtag par gnas pa'i gter yin par rig par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:410a-26: 'jig pa gsum gyi bskal pa dag gis gzhig par mi nus pa'i phyir ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:410b-0: rnam @410b bar grol ba'i mdzod yin par rig par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:410b-2: mu stegs can gyis bshol bar mi nus pa'i phyir ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:410b-4: sman gyi rgyal po'i mdzod yin par rig par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:410b-5: rtag par gzungs kyis sems can nad pa rnams kyi nad gso ba'i phyir ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:410b-7: rdzu 'phrul gyi gter yin par rig par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:410b-8: sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams su rgyu ba la rang dbang thob pa'i phyir ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:410b-9: de bas na gang zag de'i yon tan gyi bsngags pa brjod na nam yang mthar thug par mi 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:410b-10: rigs kyi bu gang la la zhig 'jig rten pa'i sdug bsngal gyis yongs su skyo nas tshe ring ba'i sman yongs su tshol bar 'dod pas dben pa'i gnas su 'dug nas mtshams yongs su dag par bcad de gos la sngags kyis btab nas bgo bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:410b-11: chu dang zas dang spos dang sman rnams la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bsdags kyis btab ste spyod par byed na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:410b-12: gdon mi za bar tshe ring bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:410b-13: gal te chos bzhin du mtshams bcad de chos bzhin du yongs su 'dzin par byed na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:410b-14: thams cad mngon par 'grub par 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:410b-15: de la mtshams gcod pa'i cho ga ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:411a-0: ral gri la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis btab ste sa la ri mo bris nas mtshams gcad @411a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:411a-2: yang na chu gtsang ma la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis btab nas phyogs bzhir gtor nas mtshams gcad par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:411a-3: yang na yungs kar la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis btab ste phyogs bzhir gtor nas mtshams gcad par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:411a-4: yang na 'du shes kyis gang du phyin pa tshun chad mtshams su 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:411a-5: yang na thal pa gtsang ma la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis btab ste mtshams gcad par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:411a-6: yang na tshon sna lnga'i skud pa la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis btab ste phyogs bzhir bskor nas mtshams gcad par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:411a-7: de ltar chos bzhin du 'di yongs su 'dzin par gyur na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:411a-8: rang gi ngang gis 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:411a-9: gzungs 'di'i ming thos pa tsam gyis kyang bskal pa tshad med pa snyed kyi 'khor ba'i kha na ma tho ba lci ba rnams yongs su 'byang bar 'gyur na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:411a-11: 'dzin pa lta smos kyang ci dgos /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:411a-12: rig sngags 'di 'don pa'i gang zag gang yin pa de dag ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:411a-13: sangs rgyas tshad med pa snyed la mchod cing rim gro byas nas dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya cher bskyed pa yin par rig par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:411b-0: gang dag sems can sdug bsngal gyi bgegs la yongs @411b su 'dren pa'i ched du chos bzhin du 'don pa gang yin pa de dag ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:411b-1: snying rje chen po dang ldan pa yin pas ring por mi thogs par mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya bar 'gyur bar rig par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:411b-2: ji tsam du sems can snang ngo cog gi ched du bzlas brjod byas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:411b-3: de dag gi rna lam du grags par byas nas byang chub kyi rgyur 'gyur bar byed na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:411b-4: gang zag de dag yon tan tshad med dpag tu med pa dag 'thob par 'gyur bas brjod kyis mi lang ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:411b-5: gang la la zhig sems rtse gcig tu sems dang lus gso sbyong dang tshul khrims la gnas nas sems can thams cad kyi sngon gyi las kyi kha na ma tho ba rnams bshags nas bdag nyid kyis bskal pa tshad med pa nas byas pa'i sdig pa'i las rnam pa sna tshogs mthol bshags te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:411b-6: kha nas gzungs 'di myur du bzlas brjod byas nas sgra rgyun chad pa med par byas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:411b-7: dge sbyong gi 'bras bu bzhi po de dag tshe 'di nyid la 'thob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:411b-8: dbang po rnon po shes rab dang ldan pa sgom pa'i thabs la mkhas pa zhig yin na ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:411b-9: sa bcu'i 'bras bu yang dka' ba med par 'gyur na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:412a-0: 'jig rten gyi bsod nams kyi rnam par smin pa phran tshegs yongs su gnyer ba tsam mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta smos @412a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:412a-2: de yang byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po dang smon lam gyi mthu shin tu zab pa'i phyir dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:412a-3: gzungs 'di'i byin gyi rlabs shin tu rgya che ba'i phyir ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:412a-4: bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:412a-5: yul gang dag na gnod pa byung bar gyur na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:412a-6: de'i tshe yul de'i rgyal pos yang dag po'i chos kyis yul 'dzin cing mi rnams bag yangs su bkod de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:412a-7: sems can stangs las mi gcod cing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:412a-8: nyes pa byung ba rnams yongs su skyabs nas nyin mtshan bdun gyi bar du lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus bskyed de thugs rje chen po'i sems kyi gzungs sngags 'di 'don par byed na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:412a-10: bgegs thams cad yongs su bsal bar 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:412a-11: 'bru rnams legs shing mi mang po bde bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:412a-12: gzhan yang phas kyi rgol ba'i dgra dag yang nas yang du 'ongs te gtses pas 'bangs mang po mi bde bar gyur tam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:412a-13: blon po chen pos rku bshams nas log par gyur tam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:412a-14: rims nad byung bar gyur tam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:412a-15: than chen byung bar gyur tam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:412a-16: nyi zla rgyu ba nor bar gyur tam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:412a-17: de lta bu la sogs pa'i gnod pa byung bar gyur na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:412b-0: de'i tshe snying rje chen @412b po dang ldan pa'i mig stong pa'i gzugs byas nas de'i phyogs su kha bstan te spos dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:412b-4: rin po che'i bla re rnam pa sna tshogs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:412b-5: ro brgya dang ldan pa'i zas dang skom gyis sems rtse gcig tu mchod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:412b-6: gzhan yang rgyal po des nyin mtshan bdun gyi bar du lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus bskyed de gzungs kyi tshig nom pa 'di 'don par byed na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:412b-7: phas kyi dgra rnams rang dul bar gyur nas slar log ste so so nas tshul bzhin du yul skyong zhing yul yang 'dre bar gnas par byams pa'i sems kyis phan tshun gcig la gcig blta bar 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:412b-8: rgyal bu dang blon po rnams kyang sri zhu dang drang dkan spyod par 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:412b-9: btsun mo dang slas rnams kyang rgyal po la sri zhu dang bsnyen bkur byed par 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:412b-10: lha dang klu dang 'dre srin rnams kyang yul de srung zhing skyong bar 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:412b-11: char chu dus bzhin du 'bab cing 'bru rnams legs pas mi mang po rnams kyang rab tu dga' bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:412b-12: gzhan yang khyim du nad chen ma rungs pa dang phrad par gyur tam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:412b-13: ltas ngan sna tshogs byung bar gyur tam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:412b-14: 'dre srin dang log pa'i bdud rnams kyis khyim dkrugs par kyur tam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:413a-0: mi ma rungs pa dag gis gleng skur btab nas @413a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:413a-1: rku bshams te gnod pa byas par gyur tam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:413a-2: khyim mi che chung rnams phyi nang mi 'dum par gyur na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:413a-3: snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i mig stong pa'i gzugs byas pa'i mdun du dkyil 'khor byas nas sems rtse gcig tu byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug yid la byas nas gzungs sngags 'di lan stong tshang bar bzlas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:413a-4: gong du smos pa'i dngos po ngan pa de dag thams cad yongs su 'byang bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:413a-5: bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:413a-8: ji ltar yongs su gzung bar bgyi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:413a-9: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:413a-11: rig sngags 'di la ming rnam pa sna tshogs yod de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:413a-12: rgya cher yongs su rdzogs pa zhes kyang bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:413a-13: thogs pa med pa'i thugs rje chen po zhes kyang bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:413a-14: sdug bsngal rnams las yongs su skyob pa'i gzungs zhes kyang bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:413a-15: tshe bsring ba'i gzungs zhes kyang bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:413a-16: ngan 'gro yongs su sbyong ba'i gzungs zhes kyang bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:413a-17: las kyi sgrib pa rnam par 'joms pa'i gzungs zhes kyang bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:413b-0: smon pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i @413b gzungs zhes kyang bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:413b-1: sems kyi rjes su rang dbang du gyur pa'i gzungs zhes kyang bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:413b-2: sa gong ma rnams las myur du 'da' ba'i gzungs zhes kyang bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:413b-3: de ltar yongs su gzung bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:413b-4: bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:413b-6: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di'i ming ci lags na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:413b-7: 'di lta bu'i gzungs bstan pa la mkhas par 'gyur lags /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:413b-8: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:413b-9: byang chub sems dpa' 'di'i ming ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:413b-10: spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ces kyang bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:413b-11: don yod pa'i zhags pa zhes kyang bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:413b-12: 'od stong pa'i mig can zhes bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:413b-13: rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'di'i ming dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:413b-17: 'das pa'i bskal pa tshad med pa'i snga rol nas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas mtshan yang de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag pa'i chos kyi snang ba zhes bya bar gyur pa yin kyang thugs rje chen po dang smon lam gyi mthus sems can bde bar bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i lus mngon du bstan pa yin pas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:414a-1: sems dpa' chen po'i 'khor mang po khyed dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:414a-5: klu rnams kyis gus pas bkur sti byas nas brnyas par mi bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:414a-6: lha dang mi thams cad kyis rtag par mchod par byas te sems rtse gcig tu ming nas rjod par byed na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:414a-7: bsod nams tshad med pa snyed 'thob par 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:414a-8: kha na ma tho ba tshad med pa snyed yongs su 'byang bar 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:414a-9: tshe 'das nas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med kyi zhing khams su skye bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:414a-10: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:414a-12: gal te rin po che sna tshogs phun sum tshogs shing phyug por 'gyur bar 'dod na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:414a-13: yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i lag la mchod pa bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:414a-14: mi bde ba rnam pa sna tshogs kyis gtses par gyur na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:414a-15: zhags pa thogs pa'i lag la mchod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:414a-16: khong par nad rnams yod par gyur na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:414a-17: rin po che'i lhung bzed thogs pa'i lag la mchod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:414a-18: 'dre gdon thams cad gdul bar 'dod na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:414a-19: rin po che'i ral gri thogs pa'i lag la mchod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:414a-20: lha'i bu'i bdud thams cad gdul bar 'dod na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:414a-21: rdo rje thogs pa'i lag la mchod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:414b-0: phas kyi rgol ba'i dgra @414b gzhom par 'dod na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:414b-1: rdo rje tho ba thogs pa'i lag la mchod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:414b-2: 'jigs shing bag tsha ba'i gnas thams cad las thar bar 'dod na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:414b-3: 'jigs pa med pa sbyin pa'i lag la mchod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:414b-4: mig mi gsal te 'od dang mi ldan par gyur na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:414b-5: me shel gyi nor bu thogs pa'i lag la mchod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:414b-6: tsha ba'i rims kyis thengs te bsil bar 'dod na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:414b-7: chu shel gyi nor bu thogs pa'i lag la mchod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:414b-9: rin po che'i gzhu thogs pa'i lag la mchod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:414b-10: grogs po mdza' bshes dang myur du phrad par 'dod na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:414b-11: rin po che'i mda' thogs pa'i lag la mchod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:414b-12: lus la nad sna tshogs kyis thebs par gyur na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:414b-13: lcug ma thogs pa'i lag la mchod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:414b-14: lus kyi bgegs ma rungs pa bsal bar 'dod na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:414b-15: rnga yab dkar po thogs pa'i lag la mchod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:414b-16: thams cad mthun pa'i 'khor du 'gyur bar 'dod na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:414b-17: bum pa thogs pa'i lag la mchod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:414b-18: stag dang 'phar spyang dang dom dred gcan gzan ma rungs pa thams cad spong bar 'dod na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:414b-19: phub thogs pa'i lag la mchod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:414b-20: gnas dang dus thams cad du rgyal po'i bgegs las thar bar 'dod na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:414b-21: dgra sta thogs pa'i lag la mchod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:415a-2: shel gyi gdub kor thogs pa'i lag la mchod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:415a-3: yon tan rnam pa sna tshogs kyi phyir ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:415a-4: padma dkar po thogs pa'i lag la mchod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:415a-5: phyogs bcu'i zhing yongs su dag pa dag tu skye bar 'dod na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:415a-6: padma sngon po thogs pa'i lag la mchod do //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:420b-3: bal po si'u'i shing gi yal ga blangs nas dum bu stong rtsa brgyad du gtubs te mgo mjug gnyi gar mar dang zho bskus nas sngags lan re bzlas shing re re bsregs te stong rtsa brgyad tshang par byas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:420b-4: gdon bgegs thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:420b-5: de yang sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar bya dgos so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:420b-6: shu dag dkar po blangs nas lan brgya rtsa brgyad sngags kyis btab ste dpung pa g-yas pa la btags na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:420b-8: 'brel ba'i gtam smra ba'i gnas thams cad du rgyal bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:420b-9: ke'u khi tshe'i shing gi lo ma'am yal ga yang rung ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:420b-10: dum bur gtubs nas mgo mjug gnyi gar ba mar yang dag pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:420b-11: sbrang rtsi dkar po dang ba zho bskus te sngags lan re bzla zhing dum bu re re sreg pa stong rtsa brgyad tshang bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:420b-12: nyin gcig la dus gsum du bya zhing dus gcig la yang lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas te zhag bdun tshang bar gyur na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:420b-13: sngags mkhan de rang gis mngon par shes par thob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:420b-14: gdon mthu bo che gdul bar 'dod na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:421a-0: lung tang la lan bzhi bcu rtsa dgu sngags kyis btab ste bu ram dang sbrang rtsi bskus nas 'phags pa snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i @421a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:421a-1: gzugs byas pa'i mdun du bsreg par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:421a-2: gi'u wang srang gcig bee d'u rya'i bum pa'i nang du bcug ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:421a-3: 'phags pa snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i gzugs byas pa'i mdun du bzhag nas sngags lan stong rtsa brgyad kyis btab ste lus la bskus sam dpral bar thig le byas na lha dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:421a-6: mi dang mi ma yin pa thams cad rab tu dga' bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:421a-7: gal te la la zhig btson rar chud par gyur na phug ron dkar po'i rtug pa la lan brgya rtsa brgyad sngags kyis btab ste lag pa la bskus nas mtshon cha la byugs na mtshon cha rang rang grol bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:421a-8: gal te khyo shug chu dang me bzhin du mi 'dum par gyur na bya dur ba'i mjug ma blangs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:421a-9: 'phags pa snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i gzugs byas pa'i mdun du sngags lan stong rtsa brgyad kyis btab nas lus la btags na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:421a-10: de dag nam 'tsho'i bar du gcig la gcig dga' zhing byams pa dang bskur bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:421a-11: lo tog dang 'bras bu rnams la srin bu zhugs te za bar gyur na sa'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:421a-13: bye ma gtsang ma blangs te lan stong rtsa brgyad sngags kyis btab nas zhing gi phyogs bzhir gtor na srin bu rnams 'gyes par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:421b-0: chu gtsang ma la sngags kyis btab ste 'bras bu'i ljon shing la gtor na srin bu 'bras bu @421b la za ba'i thugs mi thub bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:421b-1: na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:421b-2: sha ra ma h'a sha ra /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:421b-3: tu lu tu lu mah'a tu lu /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:421b-4: aom ku me ha na sha sa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:421b-5: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:421b-6: gang la la zhig 'bru dkon pa'i gnas su phyin te mu ge byung nas zan chad par gyur na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:421b-7: khyed kyis mig btsums nas lus drang por bsrang ste sems rtse gcig tu gzungs sngags 'di lan brgya rtsa brgyas bzlas nas mig phye zhig dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:421b-8: lha rnams kyis lha'i zhal zas ro brgya dang ldan pa snod bkang nas khyer te 'ong bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:421b-9: gal te khyim na gnas pa'i tshe dgos par gyur na snod gtsang ma stong pa mdun du bzhag nas mig btsums te kha chus bkang nas lcang ma'i lcug ma dang rnga yab dang lhung bzed la gtor bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:421b-10: chus gtor zin nas mig btsums te gzungs 'di lan bzhi bcu rtsa dgu bzlas na rang gi dang gis ro brgya dang ldan pa'i zas snod kun gang ba 'byung bar 'gyur bas blangs nas zhag bdun gyi bar du bza' bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:421b-11: de ltar na 'di'i mthu stobs ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:421b-12: bsam gyis mi khyab par rig par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:421b-13: zas zos zin nas mig btsums te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:421b-14: sa ra kha zhes brjod nas zas kyis lhag ma yang spang bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:421b-15: zas zos te ltor mid nas kyang myur du 'ju bar 'gyur bas stobs dang ldan zhing bde ba 'thob par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:421b-16: thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa 'thob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:422a-1: thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ba'i gzungs ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:422a-6: na ma: aa dan ni ya; au ga tsi du aug tsi du /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:422a-8: la lu te na ma ni mi ti na mi sv'a h'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:422a-9: gzungs 'di 'dzin pas phyogs bzhi nas rgyun chad pa'i ri'i rtse mor dkyil 'khor byas nas mtshams bcad lus bsrungs nas khar ba'i lhung bzed chung du zhig khron pa'i chu gtsang mas bkang ste mdun du bzhag nas gzungs sngags bzlas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:422a-10: gdon mi za bar skar ma gsal ba zhig 'ong bar 'gyur bas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:422a-11: 'ongs pa'i tshe 'jigs pa mi bskyed par sems bde bar mnyam par bzhag nas sems rtse gcig tu gzungs sngags 'don par byed na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:422a-12: dbang po rno zhing shes rab dang ldan phar 'gyur bas mi shes pa ci yang med par 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:422a-13: 'jig rten pa'i lam gyi chos kyang mi rtogs pa ci yang med par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:422a-14: thos pa rgyud pa'i tshe skar ma mchog tu gsal ba zhig lhung bzed kyi chu'i nang du 'ong bar 'du shes bskyed par bya'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:422a-15: byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thogs pa mi mnga' ba'i thugs rje chen po rgya cher yongs su rdzogs pa'i gzungs /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:422b-1: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gus pas thal mo sbyar te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:422b-2: bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:422b-5: sngon bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i bsod nams bsags pa'i rgyu dang rkyen gyis deng bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la lung bstan par mdzad pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:422b-6: bdag snying rje chen po bskyed nas sems can thams cad la sman par bgyi ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:422b-7: bcing ba mtha' dag bcad pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:422b-8: 'jigs pa thams cad zhi bar 'gyur bar bzhed pa lags pas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:422b-9: deng bdag gis yum zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs bshad par 'tshal te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:422b-10: dus tha ma'i sems can rnams yum zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs 'di thos pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi mthus de dag thams cad sdug bsngal kyi rgyu dang bral nas bde ba'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur lags so; ;bcom ldan 'das /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:422b-11: dus lnga brgya tha ma la yul lam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:422b-14: grong rdal gang yang rung ba dag tu dge slong ngam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:423a-0: rigs kyi bu mo la sogs pas rtag par gdugs mtshan lan drug tu chos bzhin du yum zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs sngags kyi chos kyi rnam @423a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:423a-3: bdag de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' drin rjes su dran zhing gzo ba'i slad du rtag par rjes su 'brangs nas gang zag de dag yongs su srung bar bgyid cing spong bar mi bgyid pas 'dre srin thams cad kyis gnod par bgyid par mi 'gyur lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:423a-4: gzhan yang tshe rabs kyi sgrib pa lci ba thams cad kyang dus gcig tu yongs su 'byang bar 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:423a-6: phyag rgya'i chos kyi sgo thams cad kyang myur du yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:423a-7: bcom ldan 'das la yang 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:423a-9: slad ma'i dus lnga brgya tha ma'i sems can rnams ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:423a-10: phal cher sdig pa'i dri ma lhun stug cing bsod nams chung bas yongs su 'dzin par bgyid pa zhig mchis na yang 'dre srin dag gis gnod pa bgyid pas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:423a-11: deng bdag bcom ldan 'das kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis sems can rnams la rgya cher sman par bgyi ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:423a-12: sems can rnams la bde bar bgyi ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:423b-0: lha dang lha ma yin la sogs pa'i ched du gzungs kyi chos bshad @423b par 'tshal te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:423b-1: bdag gis sngon 'das pa'i bskal pa tshad ma mchis pa snyed kyi bar du gzungs kyi chos 'di la bsten cing mchod pa bgyis lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:423b-4: da ltar bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi bar dag kyang yum zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i rgyus bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par brnyes pa lags pas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:423b-6: rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig sems rtse gcig tu yum zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'don cing klog pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:423b-8: de dag tshe 'di nyid la tshig gi spobs pa myur zhing thogs pa ma mchos pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:423b-9: shes rab dang sbobs pa mngon par rtogs par 'gyur bas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:423b-10: lha dang mi'i 'khor mang po'i nang na mchog tu 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:423b-11: gang dag thos pa rnams kyang rab tu dga' zhing thams cad kyi spyi bo la btud de phyag bgyid par 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:423b-12: skye ba thams cad du sangs rgyas dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:423b-15: gang ci smras kyang rung ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:423b-16: thams cad kyis yid ches pas nyan par 'gyur lags te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:423b-17: de dag thams cad kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi mthu lags te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:424a-3: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la khyod kyis 'di ltar; lha dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:424a-5: lha ma yin la sogs pa de dag thams cad la phan pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:424a-7: las kyi lam yongs su spyang ba'i ched du smras pa legs so legs so zhes sngags pa brjod nas ngas kyang deng ye shes kyi phyag rgyas btab nas khyod byams pa chen po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:424a-8: snying rje chen po la sogs pa'i sems rnam pa sna tshogs las gtan du ldog par mi 'gyur bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:424a-10: de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis yang 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:424a-12: bdag mngon par dran lags te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:424a-13: 'das pa'i bskal pa tshad ma mchis pa nas yum zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yongs su bzung bas ri po ta la la mchos pa'i tshe bdud kyi rgyal pos bdud kyi 'khor mang po dang 'grogs nas bdag gi chos dkrug cing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:424a-14: sngags kyi tshig rnams mngon par mi 'grub par bgyi bar bshams pa las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:424b-0: de'i tshe bdag gis yum zhes @424b bgyi ba'i gzungs 'dis bdud mang po rnams btul nas thams cad so sor gyes par gyur pas gzungs 'di'i mthu bsam gyis mi khyab par rig par bgyi lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:424b-1: de nas byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug byams pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:424b-2: snying rje chen pos sems can thams cad la phan gdags shing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:424b-3: lha dang mi rnams bde ba thob par bya ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:424b-4: 'khor 'dus pa chen po'i mdun du byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug phyag stong spyan stong dang ldan pa'i yum zhes bya ba'i gzungs lus po che'i sngags 'di smras so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:424b-5: na ma: sarba ta th'a ga t'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:424b-6: na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:424b-7: na mo aa mi t'a bh'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:424b-9: aarha te samya ksam bungdh'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:424b-10: na mo a'arya ba lo ki te shva r'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:424b-13: ma h'a k'a ru ni k'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:424b-14: na mo ma h'a stha m'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:424b-18: ma h'a k'a ru ni k'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:424b-19: na mo bi pu la bi ma na su pra tishthi ta sam gh'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:424b-20: s'urya sha ta sa ha sra aa ti re ka pra bha aa ba bha si ta m'u rta ye /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:424b-21: ma h'a ma ni mu ku ta kunta la aa lam k'a ra dh'a ra ni; bh'a ga wa te padma p'a na ye /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:424b-22: sarba lo ka au p'a sha ma n'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:424b-23: bi bi dha mu kha sa ma be sha bishta sarba satv'a pa ri mo tsa k'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:425a-0: ma h'a lo ka ka ra na n'a tha ma @425a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:425a-1: singdha mi ra bh'a dra bi n'a sha na ka r'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:425a-2: r'a h'a dve sha mo ha dzva la sha ma ka /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:425a-3: sha sa ka sa m'a sh'a sa n'a ka ra rkasha sarba p'a pa du rga te pra sha ma na ka r'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:425a-4: sarba ta th'a ga ta sa ma pa da na ka ra /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:425a-5: he he ma h'a bo dhi satva ba ra da padma lo ka sam bhu ta /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:425a-6: ma h'a ka ru ni ka dza t'a mu ku t'a lam gri te shva r'i ram/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:425a-7: ma ni ka na ka sha ta bdzra bee d'ury'a lam kri ta sha r'i ram/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:425a-8: aa mi t'a bh'a si na ka ma l'a lam kri ta pra bha ra na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:425a-9: la ri tsa na ma h'a du na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:425a-10: na ra ni ra sha ta sa ha sra /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:425a-11: aa bhi la sh'i ta ksha ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:425a-12: ma h'a bo dhi satva ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:425a-13: bi bha ma bi dha ma /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:425a-14: bi n'a sha ya bi n'a sha ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:425a-15: ma h'a ya ntam kle sha ka ba dha /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:425a-16: aa ba ba dha bi bi dha sa tv'a sam s'a ra ts'a ra ka pra ma tha na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:425a-19: pu ru sha s'a ga ra /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:425a-21: bi ra bi ra sha ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:425a-27: pra sh'a sa ya pra sh'a sa yi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:425a-36: bi dhu na bi dhu na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:425a-39: g'a dha ya g'a dha ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:425a-41: pra ha sa pra ha sa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:425a-42: bi bi dha kle sha b'a sa na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:425a-43: bdag ming 'di zhes bya ba'i ha ra ha ra /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:425a-44: sam ha ra sam ha ra /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:425a-45: du ru ti du ru ti /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:425a-46: ma h'a mantra du ru ti /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:425b-0: ka ra ni sha ta pa ra si ka bha ba @425b ba sa na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:425b-1: sha ma ka ma h'a bo dhi satva ba ra da sv'a h'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:425b-2: de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis bcom ldan 'das la padma chen p'i phyag rin po che'i bkod pa'i khar ba'i yum zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'di smras ma thag tu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'du shes med 'du shes med min gyi lha'i gnas kyi bar dag rnam pa drug tu g-yos so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:425b-3: rab tu g-yos par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:425b-4: lha rnams kyis kyang rin po che'i me tog gi char mngon par phab bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:425b-5: 'og min gyi lha dang dbang phyug chen po rnams kyang g-yo zhing mi bde bas shin tu 'jigs shing sdangs par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:425b-8: 'dre gdon ma rungs pa thams cad kyang sdug bsngal chen po myong ba'i sgra skad chen po phyung nas shar nub tu 'byer zhing bros kyang gang du 'gro ba'i gnas kyang rig cing rnyed par ma gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:425b-9: de nas sprul pa'i byang chub sems dpas 'khor mang po rnams dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:425b-10: 'dre srin ma rungs pa thams cad la gang gis bdag gi rig sngags las 'da' zhing rjes su 'brang bar byed na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:425b-11: de dag gi lus kyi yan lag dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:425b-12: nyid lag thams cad rab tu du 'id 'jig par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:426a-1: 'joms shing rgya mtsho chen po skem par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:426a-2: lha ma yin gyi dmag rnams rnam par bcom nas pham par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:426a-6: grong rdal rnams yongs su srung bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:426a-12: ma rungs pa'i mi rnams pham zhing rab tu zhi bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:426a-13: sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams btul nas rab tu dul bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:426a-15: de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje chen po'i pho brang rab tu dga' ba na bzhugs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:426a-16: byang chub sems dpa' mchog tu btsun pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:426a-21: mi 'am ci la sogs pa'i 'khor sangs rgyas kyi chos la gnas pa tshad med pa thams cad kyis kyang dus gcig tu bsngags pa brjod par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:426a-22: de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis yang 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:426a-24: sgrib pa'i ri bo shin tu rgya che ba dag kyang rnam par 'joms par bgyid pas gang la la zhig nyan tam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:426b-2: de dag la nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa nag po ji snyed cig mchis pa de dag thams cad zhu byang bar 'gyur lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:426b-3: gzhan yang gang la la zhig rtag par nang par langs nas gus pa'i sems las yum gyi gzungs 'di lan nyi shu rtsa gcig klog gam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:426b-5: byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug nyid rtag par de'i rjes su 'brangs nas yongs su srung bar bgyid cing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:426b-6: yongs su skyob par bgyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:426b-7: gang la la zhig smon lam rgya chen po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:426b-8: ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo chen po thams cad myur du 'grub par 'tshal na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:426b-9: gcig pu gnas dben par mchis nas byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug yid la dran par bgyi zhing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:426b-10: gzhan yid la mi bgyi bar rtag par gzungs 'di lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:426b-11: smon lam rnams mi 'grub pa gang yang ma mchis lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:426b-12: gzhan yang sems can gyi snying drung du sdug par 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:426b-13: ngan 'gro'i sgo thams cad du ltung bar mi 'gyur lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:426b-14: mchis kyang rung ma mchis kyang rung ste rtag par sangs rgyas mdun na bzhugs par 'du shes nye bar bzhag par gyur na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:427a-1: zag de skye ba'i gnas bye ba brgya stong tshang ma mchis pa kun tu bsags pa'i sdig pa'i las ci mchis pa de dag thams cad zhu byang bar 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:427a-2: gang zag de 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po stong gi bsod nams phun sum tshogs pa dag la longs spyod par 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:427a-3: skye ba thams cad du byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang dus gcig tu skye bar 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:427a-4: btsun pa'i khyim dag tu skye bar 'gyur lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:427a-5: gang la la zhig rtag par spos sam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:427a-6: me tog snyim pa gang tsam byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs kyi mdun du mngon par gtor nas gzungs 'di lan nyi shu rtsa gcig 'don par bgyid na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:427a-7: stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi yon tan dang snying rje chen po'i chos nyid 'thob par 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:427a-8: gang zag de 'jig rten na mthar gyis mthu chen po myur du mngon par 'grub par 'gyur lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:427a-9: gang la la zhig rtag par byang chub sems dpa' gdong dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:427a-12: dpe byad la rnam par bltas te gzungs 'di lan stong rtsa brgyad 'don par bgyid na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:427b-0: byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs @427b dbang phyug myur du lus mngon sum du bstan nas rnal 'byor pas mthong bar 'gyur bas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:427b-1: dri ma dang bral nas sa dang po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:427b-2: sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'thob par 'gyur bas 'od kyis 'jig rten gyi khams gsal bar bgyid par 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:427b-3: 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe bsam gtan dang ting nge 'dzin la sogs par 'jug pa bzhin du 'chi bar 'gyur bas tshe rabs thams cad du sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa'i shes rab thob par 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:427b-4: kha na ma tho ba'i sdig pa ci mchis pa thams cad kyang zhu zhing byang bar 'gyur lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:427b-5: gzungs 'di yongs su 'dzin par 'tshal ba des rtag par dpyid zla ra ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:427b-7: ston zla tha chung tshes gcig nas tshes bcu'i bar du gso sbyong dang tshul khrims la gnas nas gos dkar po gtsang ma bgos te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:428a-0: zas dkar gsum 'tshal nas ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten nam ring bsrel gyi mdun du tsandan dkar po'i 'jim pa las dkyil 'khor khru gang gru bzhi pa bgyis nas me tog dang spos rnam pa sna tshogs dkyil 'khor gyi nang du gtor nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar spos kyis bdugs te zhugs mar bltams nas sangs @428a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:428a-2: byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gus pa'i sems bskyed de rtag par gzungs 'di lan stong rtsa brgyad 'don par bgyid na; tshes bco lnga'i nub mo byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug nyid dkyil 'khor gyi nang du mchi bar 'gyur bas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:428a-3: rnal 'byor pas mthong ma thag tu mtshams ma mchis pa lnga'i kha na ma tho ba shin tu lci ba'i sgrib pa ci mchis pa thams cad zhu byang nas lus dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:428a-5: yid kyi las thams cad yongs su dag par 'gyur bas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:428a-6: sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi mthu dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:428a-7: dbang bskur ba'i sa'i mthu dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:428a-8: pha rol tu phyin pa'i sa'i mthu dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:428a-9: khyad par du 'phags pa'i ye shes kyi sa yang 'thob par 'gyur lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:428a-11: gal te dgung char dbab par 'tshal bar gyur na; gnam du bltas nas gzungs 'di stong rtsa brgyad 'don par bgyid na zil dngar gyi char dus bzhin du 'bab par 'gyur lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:428a-12: dog sa la bltas nas gzungs 'di lan stong rtsa brgyad tshang bar 'don par bgyid na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:428a-13: 'bru rnam pa sna tshogs legs par 'gyur lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:428b-0: chab mig bskams @428b pa'i drung du gzungs 'di lan stong rtsa brgyad 'don par bgyid na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:428b-1: chab 'phel zhing rgyas par 'gyur lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:428b-2: bro nad kyis thebs pa thams cad kyi mdun du rang gi sug pa lag pa la sngags 'dis lan bdun bsngags te sug pas bya bas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:428b-4: gang dran pa nyams pa'i mdun du gzungs 'di lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:428b-5: yang dag pa'i dran pa 'thob par 'gyur lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:428b-6: gang dag bkres skom gyis nyen pa'i mdun du de'i gdong la bltas nas gzungs 'di lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:428b-7: bkres skom gyis nyen pa'i 'du shes ngan pa thams cad rab tu gsal bar 'gyur lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:428b-8: gang dag mtshams dgum par 'tshal na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:428b-9: rdzing chab kyi nang du zhugs te chos bzhin du gzungs 'di yongs su rdzogs par bris nas rgyal mtshan gyi khar btags na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:428b-10: dpag tshad brgya tshun chang du gdon bgegs ci yang ma mchis te mtshams bkum pa nyid du gyur nas yongs su srung bar 'gyur lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:428b-11: rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig rtag par gdugs gcig bzhin du gzungs 'di lan stong rtsa brgyad 'don par bgyid na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:429a-1: brjod kyis mi lang bas rig sngags 'dzin pa de dag btsun zhing dbang phyug dang ldan par 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:429a-2: gzhan yang skye bo mang po kun gyis byams shing bsnyen bkur bgyid par 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:429a-3: smon lam rnams yid bzhin du yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:429a-5: yum gyi gzungs 'di bzlas te gu gul la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis btab nas sngags 'di lan re bzlas shing lan gcig bsreg pa lan brgya rtsa brgyad tshang bar bgyis na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:429a-6: yongs su bsal bar 'gyur lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:429a-7: gal te skye bo mang po thams cad dga' bar 'tshal na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:429a-8: rtag par lcang ma'i lcug ma la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis btab ste g-yar khar bcas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:429a-9: thams cad kyis byams shing bkur bar 'gyur lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:429a-10: gang dag bdag nyid spobs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:429a-11: shes rab dang ldan par 'tshal na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:429a-12: shu dag srang gcig phye mar btags te chab mar dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:429a-13: sbrang rtsi dang sbyar nas ril bu bgyis te yum gyi gzungs 'dis mtshan ma gsum po 'di lta ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:429a-16: 'od byung gi bar du sngags kyis gdab par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:429b-0: mtshan @429b ma de dag thob nas gdugs re bzhin sman gyi ril bu tsam bdun bdun 'tshal nas snying gar yang yang byug par bgyi ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:429b-1: de ltar zhag brgya'i bar du 'tshal na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:429b-2: thogs pa ma mchis pa'i spobs pa 'thob par 'gyur pas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:429b-3: bdag nyid kyi lus bsrung ba'i slad du gdugs re zhing yum gyi gzungs 'di lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas nas phyag rgya rnam pa bcu gnyis kyang bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:429b-4: de la dang po byang chub sems dpa' mig stong dang ldan pa'i lus kun tu srung ba'i phyag rgya ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:429b-5: 'di lags te; sngar langs nas 'greng ste lus drang por bsrang nas rkang pa gnyis gshibs te rkang pa g-yas pa chung zad cig dgug par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:429b-6: sngar sug pa lag pa g-yon pa thur du brkyang nas gung mo dang srin lag gnyis bkug ste lag mthil du bzhag la mthe'u chung dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:429b-9: yan par brkyang ste lag mthil bkan nas gyen du phyogs par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:429b-10: de'i rjes la sug pa g-yas pa yang de bzhin du bgyis nas gung mo bkug ste phrag pa dang mnyam par bgyis nas lag mthil mdun du blta bar bgyi ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:429b-12: lus kun sdud pa'i phyag rgya zhes bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:430a-0: gal te bdud dang mu stegs can log par lta ba'i @430a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:430a-1: thibs po bcom nas yang dag pa'i lam du gzung bar 'tshal na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:430a-2: phyag rgya 'di bgyis nas sngags lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas nas gdon mi 'tshal bar smon pa bzhin 'grub par 'gyur lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:430a-5: na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:430a-6: na ma a'arya aa ba lo ki te shva r'a ya; bo dhi satv'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:430a-8: ma h'a k'a ru ni k'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:430a-13: ae hi he hi sv'a h'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:430a-14: de la gnyis pa byang chub sems dpa' mig stong dang ldan pa'i kun 'dzin gyi gzungs phyag rgya ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:430a-16: snga ma'i lus kun sdud pa'i phyag rgya bzhin du thal mo sbyar te snying gar bzhag nas sor mo lnga snol mar btang ste g-yon pas g-yas pa mnan nas mdzub mo gnyis drang por bsgreng ste rtse mo phrad par bgyis la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:430a-17: mthe bo gnyis mdzub mo gnyis kyi tshigs pa dang po la mnan nas cung zad cig dbye bar bgyi ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:430a-19: kun 'dzin gyi phyag rgya zhes bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:430a-20: phyag rgya 'di bgyis par gyur na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:430b-0: bskal pa tshad ma mchis pa tshun chad kyi 'khor ba'i sdig pa'i las ci mchis pa thams cad dus gcig tu yongs @430b su byang bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:430b-1: slad ma'i dus kyi tshe phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dag tu skye bar 'gyur lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:430b-2: bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa mngon par rdzogs par byang chub tu nye ba'i tshe bdud kyi rgyal pos glags btsal ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:430b-3: kun 'dzin gyi gzungs kyi phyag rgya 'di mdzad pas shin tu bde ba'i bsam gtan dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:430b-4: ting nge 'dzin brnyes par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:430b-13: de la gsum pa byang chub sems dpa' mig stong dang ldan pa'i rnam par thar pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:430b-15: ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:430b-17: slar bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g-yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te spyi bor thal mo sbyar nas mdzub mo gnyis bkug ste rtse mo sprad la mthe bong gnyis mdzub mo'i tshigs gnyis pa'i steng du bkan par bgyi ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:430b-21: ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya zhes bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:430b-22: 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis kyang chos 'di mngon par bsgrubs pas bsam gtan dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:431a-3: snga ma dang mthun lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:431a-4: gang la la zhig gdugs re bzhin du phyag rgya 'di bgyis te mchod pa bgyis na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:431a-5: phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas rnams myur du mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:431a-6: de la bzhi pa byang chub sems dpa' mig stong dang ldan pa'i phyag rgya ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:431a-7: 'di lags te; langs nas 'greng ste rkang pa gnyis gshibs nas sngar gung mo dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:431a-9: mthe'u chung rnams rgyab sprad la mdzub mo gnyis 'greng ste rtse mo sprad nas mthe bong gnyis mdzub mo'i tshigs kyis gnyis pa'i steng mnan te lag pa gnyis kyi bar du tshon sna lnga tsam phye nas smin mtshams su gzhag par bgyi ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:431a-11: mig stong dang ldan pa'i phyag rgya zhes bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:431a-12: phyag rgya'i chos kyi sgo 'di bgyis par gyur na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:431a-13: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams gya nom pa bye ba phrag brgya stong snyed mthong bar 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:431a-14: sangs rgyas kyi zhing khams re re nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' 'bum phrag bcu dang bzhi stong rnal 'byor pa de'i grogs bgyid par 'gyur lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:431b-0: gang dag dkyil 'khor gyi chos kyi sgor lan gsum ma zhugs pa de dag @431b gi phyag rgya'i chos kyi sgo 'di mthong du yang mi rung la cho ga 'di yang bgyir mi rung lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:431b-1: rtags mthong ba'i byang chub sems dpa' chos dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:431b-2: ye shes kyi mngon par shes pa gsal ba zhig lags na ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:431b-3: ci dang ci smon pa de dag thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:431b-6: aom sarba tsakshu: ka r'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:431b-9: de la lnga pa byang chub sems dpa' mig stong dang ldan pa'i lag stong kun sdud pa'i phyag rgya ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:431b-11: langs nas sug pa rkang pa gshibs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:431b-12: sngar sug pa lag pa g-yas pa'i lag mthil bkang nas sor mo lnga so sor phan tshun du bsnyen te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:431b-13: de'i rjes la sug pa lag pa g-yon pa'i lag mthil g-yas pa'i steng du mnan nas snying gar 'jog pa gang lags pa 'di ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:431b-14: lag stong kun sdud pa'i phyag rgya zhes bgyi ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:431b-15: 'dis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bdud ji snyed mchis pa thams cad sdud cing 'dul bar bgyi lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:431b-18: aa ba lo ki te shva r'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:431b-19: sarba dushta ao h'a ya ni sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:432a-0: de la drug pa byang chub sems dpa' mig stong pa'i ting nge 'dzin rtogs par 'gyur pa'i @432a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:432a-3: 'greng ste rting pa gnyis sprad nas sngar sug pa lag pa g-yon pa'i sor mo 'greng ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:432a-4: gung mo bkug nas mdun du phul la; de'i rjes la sug pa lag pa g-yas pa yang de bzhin du bgyis nas gung mo bkug ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:432a-5: nang logs su phul ba 'di ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:432a-6: ting nge 'dzin rtogs par 'gyur ba'i phyag rgya zhes bgyi ba lags na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:432a-8: ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i bkod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:432a-9: chos kyi sgo mo brgyad khri bzhi stong yang rtogs par 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:432a-10: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang mngon du bgyid par 'gyur lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:432a-12: snga ma nyid bzla bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:432a-13: de la bdun pa byang chub sems dpa' mig stong pa'i lha klu sde brgyad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:432a-14: 'dre srin rnams dgug cing sdud pa'i phyag rgya ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:432a-16: 'greng nas rkang pa gnyis gshibs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:432a-17: sngar sug pa lag pa g-yon pa'i srin lag gis mthe bong sen mo la reg par bgyis nas de'i rjes la sug pa lag pa g-yas pa yang de bzhin du bgyis te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:432a-18: mthe'u chung dang gung mo gnyis dang por bsgreng nas rtse mo phan tshun phrad par bgyis la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:432a-19: lag ngar gyi tshigs gnyis sbyar nas mdzub mo ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:432b-0: aom sarba de ba n'a ga aa @432b na ri sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:432b-1: de la brgyad pa byang chub sems dpa' mig stong pas tshangs pa chen po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:432b-2: brgya byin lha'i dbang po g-yar drang nas chos 'dri ba'i phyag rgya ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:432b-4: phyag rgya snga ma'i steng du lag ngar gyi tshigs gnyis phye nas sug pa lag pa'i zur sprad de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:432b-10: aom mah'a prahma ya ae hi ae hi sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:432b-11: phyag rgya dang rig sngags 'dis ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:432b-12: gzungs kyi phyag rgya'i sgo mo tshad ma mchis shing grangs ma mchis pa thams cad yang dag par sdud cing 'du bar bgyi'o; ;gal te nyi zla la gza' zhugs par gyur na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:432b-13: chab mar la lan brgya rtsa brgyad sngags kyis gdab par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:432b-14: yang na lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags bzla bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:432b-15: chab mar phyag rgyas btab ste 'tshal na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:432b-16: dbang po rno bar 'gyur bas gdugs gcig la sho lo ka khri lobs par 'gyur lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:432b-17: phyag rgya'i chos kyi sgo mo 'di ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:432b-18: de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i snying pos byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:432b-19: de la dgu pa byang chub sems dpa' mig stong pa'i bar du dga' ba'i yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i phyag rgya ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:432b-21: 'greng nas snying gar thal mo sbyar te mthe bong gnyis ka lag mthil du bkug nas sor mo gzhan bzhi ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:433a-2: snying gar thal mo sbyar nas rig sngags snga ma 'don par bgyid na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:433a-3: gdon mi 'tshal bar lha rnams kyi gzhal med khang dag tu 'jug par 'gyur; phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams su kun tu rgyu zhing rin po che brgyad stong bsam pa bzhin thob nas sangs rgyas rnams la mchod pa bgyid par 'gyur lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:433a-4: gang la la zhig chos kyi sgo 'di mngon par sgrub pa gang legs pa des nang par sngar langs nas khrus yongs su dag par bgyis te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:433a-6: phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas gang+g'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed mngon sum du mthong nas bskal pa tshad ma mchis ba snyed kyi 'khor ba'i las ngan pa'i kha na me tho ba lci ba rnams yongs su 'byang bar 'gyur bas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:433a-7: de'i slad yon tan 'di lta bu'i bsngags pa brjod pa lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:433a-8: de la bcu pa byang chub sems dpa' mig stong pa'i smon pa rnams yid bzhin du mngon par 'grub pa'i phyag rgya ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:433a-10: phyag rgya snga ma bzhin du bgyis pa las mdzub mo gnyis bkug ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:433a-11: mthe bong gnyis kyi sen mo mnan nas mdzub mo'i sen mo ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:433a-14: snga ma nyid bzla bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:433a-16: smon pa rnams mngon par 'grub cing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:433b-0: gdon mi za bar byang chub kyi lam las @433b ldog par mi 'gyur lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:433b-1: de la bcu gcig pa byang chub sems dpa' mig stong pa'i 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:433b-3: phyag rgya snga ma bzhin du bgyis pa las mdzub mo lnga drang por bsgreng ste thal mo dbye bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:433b-5: bdag sngon rgyu'i sa la gnas pa'i tshe gang+g'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas rnams kyis bdag la stsal pas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:433b-6: bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi lam mngon sum du gyur pa lags te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:433b-8: snga ma nyid bzla bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:433b-9: de la bcu gnyis pa byang chub sems dpa' mig stong dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas spyan 'dren pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:433b-11: phyag rgya snga ma bzhin du snying gar thal mo sbyar nas mdzub mo gnyis phan tshun rgyu bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:433b-14: aom sarbba buddha sa ma ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:433b-17: de la byang chub sems dpa' mig stong lag stong dang ldan pa'i dkyil 'khor 'bri ba'i cho ga ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:433b-19: bcom ldan 'das rdzu 'phrul chen po dang ldan pa'i yum gyi dkyil 'khor dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:434a-0: dus tha ma'i dus kyi tshe rig sngags 'dzin pa rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i rig sngags kyi gzungs sngags kyi dkyil 'khor mnyam pa'i ting nge 'dzin @434a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:434a-1: thams cad myur du gsal bar mthong bar 'gyur bar bgyid pas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:434a-2: rig sngags 'dzin pa'i gang zag gang lags pa des rtag par ngag bsdams te bre mo'i gtam rnams smra bar mi bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:434a-3: gzungs las byung ba'i rdzu 'phrul dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:434a-5: mtshan ma ya mtshan can rnam pa sna tshogs gang lags pa de dag ma brtags par bab col du brgyud par mi bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:434a-6: yongs su dang ba'i sems kyis dran pa nye bar bzhag nas skad cig tsam du yang rnam par g-yeng bar mi bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:434a-7: gal te khe la gdubs slad rol du gzhan dag la tha dad pa'i mtshan ma ston par bgyid na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:434a-8: sdig pa'i las sbyong bar 'tshal yang de dag 'grub par mi 'gyur lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:434a-9: gal te yang dag par yongs su dang ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:434a-10: chos kyi bsam pa gang lags pa des sgom par mi bgyid na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:434a-11: bgyis pa rnams chab 'tshal zhing don ma mchis par sdug bsngal sna tshogs myong ba tsam du bas kyi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:434a-12: nam yang sgrub pa dag mngon par 'grub par mi 'gyur bas rtag par nan tan brtson 'grus kyis tshul khrims yongs su dag par bsrungs nas rku ba rnam pa lnga dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:434b-2: phrag dog gi tshig smra bar gyur tam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:434b-5: rig sngags kyi cho ga rku ba'i nongs pa 'di dag byung bar gyur na; sangs rgyas dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:434b-6: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis spong bar mdzad pas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:434b-7: 'di skad du ngas khyed spangs pa ma yin yang gzigs shing yongs su bsdu ba'i 'os ma yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:434b-11: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi tshul khrims yongs su dag pa bshig pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:434b-14: dge ba'i mtshan nyid thams cad la skur cing 'jig par bgyis pa lags bas de lta bu'i gang zag de dag ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:434b-15: rtag par lha'i bu'i bdud dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:434b-18: bi n'a ya ka rnams dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:434b-19: khams gcig tu bsdu ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:434b-20: las gcig la gnas pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:434b-21: gtan du skyabs ma mchis par 'gyur ba lags pas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:434b-22: 'phags pa rnams kyis yongs su skyob par mi mdzad cing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:435a-0: drang srong thams cad kyis smod par 'gyur bar rig @435a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:435a-2: lam sun 'byin cing chos 'jig par bgyid pa'i gang zag de lta bu de dag gdugs mtshan du rtag par gzungs 'di rjes su dran par bgyid kyang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:435a-4: bdag gis gang zag de dag nam yang 'grub par mi 'gyur bar mthong lags te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:435a-5: de ltar mi 'grub pa de yang bdag gis nongs pa ma lags kyi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:435a-6: de dag rang nyid kyi nongs skyon lags pas don de'i slad du gzungs 'di'i cho ga dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:435a-7: glegs bam de dag gis mthong zhing thos par yang mi bgyi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:435a-8: 'don cing 'dzin tu stsal bar yang mi bgyi ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:435a-9: gang dag tshangs par spyod pa yongs su dag pa srung ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:435a-10: byams pa dang snying rje'i sems dang ldan pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:435a-11: sems can la snying rje zhing byang chub yongs su gnyer bar bgyid pa dag gis yi ger bris nas klog pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:435a-14: yum gyi gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor mngon par 'grub par 'gyur bas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:435b-0: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mchog tu gsang ba'i snying po lags pa'i slad du rig sngags 'dzin pas @435b yang dag pa'i sems dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:435b-1: brtson 'grus kyi sems kyis lus kyi yan lag dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:435b-8: mig la sogs pa yang yongs su spangs nas gzhan dag la stsal te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:435b-9: chos 'di yongs su gnyer nas rtag par nan tan brtson 'grus kyis mngon par sgrub pa 'tshal na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:435b-16: nor rdzas rnam pa sna tshogs rnam par grol ba'i yul gyi gzungs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:435b-18: phyag rgya'i gzugs brnyan gyi chos kyi ched du gtong ba lta smos kyang ci 'tshal te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:435b-19: slob dpon gyis bstan pa ji lta pa bzhin du sems rtse gcig tu bsgrub par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:435b-21: rnam par grol ba'i gzungs kyi chos 'di ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:435b-22: slad ma'i dus tha ma'i tshe sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa bgyis nas yang dag pa'i spyod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:435b-23: yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:435b-25: lta bas bgrod pa'i phyogs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:435b-26: rnam par grol ba'i lam mngon par 'grub par bgyid cing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:436a-0: de dag dus 'di nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par @436a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:436a-1: 'tshang rgya ba'i bar du nam yang ldog par mi 'gyur bar bgyid pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:436a-2: dkyil 'khor de yang gtsug lag khang gi nang ngam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:436a-5: nags tshal gyi drung du yang rung ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:436a-6: nye 'khor kun tu khru gang yan chad nas shing gi rtsa ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:436a-10: rus pa la sogs pa ci mchis pa brkos te bsal nas dog sa bzang po las rmang khru gang tsam du blangs te brdungs nas mnyam por bgyis la ba lang gi lci ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:436a-11: spos chab dog sa ser po dang bsres nas 'jim pa bgyis te legs par byug cing zhal zhal bgyis nas gling lngar bgo bar bgyi'o; ;de la dbus kyi gling ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:436a-12: zheng du khru gsum tsam du bgyis te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:436a-13: dbus kho nar khru do gru bzhir lham par mchis pa'i rin po che'i 'khor lo rtsibs brgya rtsa brgyad dang ldan pa zhig bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:436a-14: gzhan yang 'khor lo dbus su rin po che'i padma kha phye ba 'dab ma sum cu rtsa gnyis mchis pa khru gang ba zhig bri bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:436a-15: gzhan yang 'khor lo'i tha ma 'khor bar 'od 'bar ba bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:436a-16: de'i rjes la gling gi gru bzhir padma kha bye ba re re bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:436b-0: gzhan @436b yang padma re re'i steng du yid bzhin gyi nor bu re re bris nas nor bu bzhi po'i steng du 'od 'bar ba bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:436b-1: gzhan yang 'dab ma sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa'i padma de'i steng du byang chub sems dpa' spyan re gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs tsandan dkar po las bgyis pa zhig bzhag par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:436b-2: de nas gling gnyis pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:436b-3: zheng du khru gang bar bgyis nas sngar gru bzhir padma kha bye ba re re bri bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:436b-4: gzhan yang padma de dag re re'i steng du ri rab lhun po'i stan rim pa gsum mchis pa gsum gsum bris nas byang shar mtshams kyi stan la dbang phyug chen po'i lha bri'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:436b-5: shar lho'i mtshams kyi stan la ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:436b-7: lho nub mtshams kyi stan la ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:436b-9: nub byang mtshams kyi stan la ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:436b-12: rin po che'i me tog dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:436b-13: phreng ba bcu drug bri bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:436b-14: de nas gling gsum pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:436b-15: zheng du khru do bri bar bgyis te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:436b-16: sa gzhi sngon po la gser gyi thig bkra ba 'ba' zhig bri bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:436b-17: de nas gling bzhi pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:436b-18: zheng du khru gang bar bgyis te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:436b-19: ngos bzhi spyi la bar chad nyi shu rtsa brgyad du byas nas bar chad dum bu re re nang du yang padma kha bye ba re re bri bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:437a-0: @437a *// gzhan yang go rim bzhin du padma de dag re re'i steng du yang rdo rje tho ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:437a-1: rtse gsum pa'i phyag rgya dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:437a-8: dbyig pa thogs pa'i phyag rgya dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:437a-10: yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i phyag rgya dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:437a-11: gshin rje'i dbyig pa'i phyag rgya dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:437a-12: bi n'a ya ka'i phyag rgya dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:437a-15: sug pa lag pa sna tshogs dang ldan ba'i phyag rgya rnams so sor bris nas phyag rgya de dag kun la yang 'od 'bar ba dag bri bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:437a-16: gzhan yang lho phyogs kyi chab sgor bar chad bgyis pa'i nang du ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:437a-18: nub phyogs kyi chab sgor bar chad bgyis pa'i nang du ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:437a-20: byang phyogs kyi chab sgor bar chad bgyis pa'i nang du ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:437a-22: shar phyogs kyi chab sgor bar chad bgyis pa'i nang du ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:437a-23: lha gzhon nu bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:437a-24: de nas gru bzhi'i gnas so sor ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:437a-25: rgyal po chen po bzhi khro gnyer can g-yog 'khor dang bcas pa bri bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:437a-26: de nas gling lnga pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:437b-0: khru gang bar bgyis te @437b ngos bzhi kun tu 'bras bu'i ljon shing dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:437b-1: me tog gi ljon shing dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:437b-2: rin po che'i ljon shing rnam pa sna tshogs bri bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:437b-3: gzhan yang gru bzhi kun tu rin po che'i ri rab lhun po re re bri bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:437b-5: rgya mtsho chen po'i chab bri bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:437b-6: dkyil 'khor gyi slad nang gi gling rnams kyi sa gzhi ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:437b-8: gzhan yang slad nang gi gling rnams kyi nub phyogs kyi nub sgo'i lho'i ngos kyi zur la sngags mkhan 'byung zhing 'jug pa'i chab sgo gcig dbye bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:437b-9: gzhan yang spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mig stong lag stong dang ldan pa'i gzugs bgyis pa gcig dbus su kha shar phyogs su blta bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:437b-10: gzhan yang mig stong lag stong dang ldan pa'i mdo sde glegs bam gcig padma 'dab ma sum cu rtsa gnyis mchis pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du bzhag nas gzugs bgyis pa de'i mdun du gzhan yang tsandan dkar po'i dri chab zhal bu bcu drug dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:437b-11: zhal zas rnam pa sna tshogs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:437b-13: shing tog la sogs pas bkang ba'i gzhong bu nyi shu rtsa lnga dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:437b-15: bum pa dar tshon sna tshogs dang /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:438a-3: phreng ba sna sna nas nyi shu nyi shu dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:438a-4: mar me nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:438a-7: de la sogs pa'i spos deb tshe nyi shu dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:438a-8: byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs bris pa'i 'phan dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:438a-9: dar tshon sna tshogs las bgyis pa'i 'phan spyir phreng nyi shu rtsa lnga bsham par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:438a-10: 'di ltar mchod pa bgyid pa'i zhal deb dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-046:438a-12: bum pa la sogs pa de dag thams cad gser dang /
